source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_00<tab>The Vath fleetfoot is keeping a vigilant eye on the borders of Loth ast Vath.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_00<tab>ヴァスの塚のイダテンは、周囲を警戒しているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_01<tab>Incursions by the Gnath into Vath territory continue to trouble the Vath fleetfoot. Lacking sufficient warriors to adequately guard their borders, he asks you to patrol the area near the Stained One and slay any Gnath that may be hiding there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_01<tab>イダテンに、進軍中の「繋がりし者たち」の兵を倒すよう頼まれた。高地ドラヴァニアの邪竜の彫像で、「繋がりし者たち」の兵を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_02<tab>You have slain the Gnath lying in wait at the Stained One. Inform the fleetfoot that the area is now safe.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_02<tab>「繋がりし者たち」の兵を討伐した。ヴァスの塚の「イダテン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_03<tab>The fleetfoot is relieved that the Vath borders are safer now. You learn that the Gnath generally consider those who lose their link to the Onemind an aberrant impurity, and attempt to eliminate them. Loth ast Vath is the only safe haven for those who no longer share a consciousness with the hive, and this is why it must be protected.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_SEQ_03<tab>イダテンに、進軍中の「繋がりし者たち」の兵を倒したことを伝えた。かつて「繋がりし者たち」は、意識の繋がらないグナース族を不純物扱いして処分していたそうだ。だからこそ、ストーリーテラーが築いたヴァスの塚という居場所を、イダテンは守りたいと思っているらしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_TODO_00<tab>Inspect locations around the Stained One.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_TODO_00<tab>邪竜の彫像で「繋がりし者たち」の兵を討伐

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_000<tab>The Gnath grow ever bolder. Their incursions into our territory grow more daring. They are starting to become too much for us to deal with alone.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_000<tab>シシシシシ……我々のナワバリに、
「繋がりし者たち」の兵が、侵入してきているようだ……。
いつになく数も多く、嫌な予感がするぞ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_001<tab>We do not have enough warriors and so cannot patrol the area of the Stained One. Please go there, inspect the area, and make sure it is safe. If you see any Gnath, kill them. <click> <click>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_001<tab>ヒトの狩人よ、「邪竜の彫像」辺りまでの安全を確保したい。
進軍中の「繋がりし者たち」の兵を探し、撃退してくれないか？
よろしく頼むぞ……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_010<tab>Please inspect the area near the Stained One. Make sure it is safe. Kill any Gnath who may be waiting to ambush us.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_010<tab>ヒトの狩人よ、「邪竜の彫像」辺りまでの安全を確保したい。
進軍中の「繋がりし者たち」の兵を探し、撃退してくれないか？
よろしく頼むぞ……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_020<tab>Thank you, generous hunter. The Onemind have never been able to understand the Nonmind. To them we are as an impurity to be eradicated.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_020<tab>シシシシシ……よくやってくれた、感謝するぞ狩人よ！
「繋がりし者たち」からすれば、我々は異質なのだ。
そのため、かつては不純物として処分されていた……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_021<tab>It is thanks to the storyteller that Loth ast Vath exists. It is thanks to Loth ast Vath that the Vath exist─that we are who we are. We cannot suffer to lose Loth ast Vath.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ315_01807_IDATEN_000_021<tab>ストーリーテラーが「ヴァスの塚」を築いてくれたお陰で、
今の我ら……「分かたれし者」がある……。
だから、この場所を絶対に守りたいのだ……シシシシシ。
